game.title: Eternal Realms: The Lost City
game.synopsis: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the once-great city of Eldarath has been hidden away for centuries. As a skilled archaeologist, you are tasked with uncovering the secrets of this ancient metropolis and restoring it to its former glory.
game.beginning: You find yourself standing at the entrance of an ancient forest, with rumors of Eldarath's location whispering through the wind. Your trusty map leads you through the dense foliage, where you stumble upon a hidden temple adorned with intricate carvings.
game.ending: With the city's secrets revealed and its power harnessed, you are hailed as a hero by the people of the realm. However, as you stand victorious amidst the restored Eldarath, you begin to realize that your actions have set in motion a chain of events that will change the course of history forever.
